text:
Newfront (W18) | Experienced Full Stack & Frontend Engineers | San Francisco | Onsite

Newfront is a fast-growing startup modernizing the $500bn+ insurance industry by supercharging brokers with technology. At our office in San Francisco, you'll have the opportunity to join a talented team of engineers with a singular focus: to bring an otherwise legacy industry into the 21st century.

https://jobs.lever.co/newfrontinsurance?team=Technology
